data.name: Amidst Whispering Winds
data.description: A bedroom that embodies the notion of a "caring heart." For busy folk, a bedroom may simply be a place that contains a bed, a place where one gets a little shut-eye, and which does not require too much thought. But for those with an eye for detail, every part of one's living space is worth time and effort.\nWhether they be the winds of freedom or resistance, they all began as the tiniest of gentle breezes. One who travels far must take good care of themselves, and surely fatigue will slip away unnoticed if one lives surrounded by warmth and comfort.

text.text: Such a tidy room... It reminds me of the Knights of Favonius' guest room.
Now, if only it had a few cute decorations, it would be even more cozy...
Let's go buy some when you have the time!
Did you arrange all of this yourself?
To have you do such strenuous work yourself... I should have come to your aid earlier. I have neglected my duty as a maid.
You must be tired after a hard day's work. I'll brew you some tea and prepare your favorite snacks. Please rest well.
It's completely furnished, is well-placed, enjoys good lighting... Yes, this bedroom will do just fine.
Some members of the aristocracy hanker after decorations of luxury and beauty, but arrange the room in an absolutely horrific manner... I detest such aristocratic customs.
But this place... now this a place one can really relax.
